member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfCarousel.iOS.SFCarouselViewMode
member.summary: Contains the values for the view mode enumeration that about to layout based on user input.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCarousel.iOS.SFCarouselViewMode.SFCarouselViewModeDefault
member.summary: Layouts the control in an 3D layered structure with rotation angle specified.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCarousel.iOS.SFCarouselViewMode.SFCarouselViewModeLinear
member.summary: Layouts the control in a horizontal Flat layout.
